content: Now that Obama has succeded in wiping out aig CEO's debts by giving them all this stimulas money, when is he gonna do somthing for the american taxpayer, The congress and president have sent out enough money to these theves that they could have wiped out the debt of all americans and the economy would have picked up right off. Lets all go thank the man in charge for making them ( CEO theves) richer.
